parameters.query:
=INSERT INTO users (id, username, star_balance, created_at)
VALUES (
  '{{ $json.body.user_id }}',
  '{{ $json.body.username }}',
  50,
  NOW()
)
ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET
  username = COALESCE(NULLIF(EXCLUDED.username, ''), users.username),
  star_balance = COALESCE(users.star_balance, 50);

UPDATE users SET
  free_stylize = 1,
  free_remove_bg = 1,
  free_enhance = 1,
  free_reset_date = CURRENT_DATE
WHERE id = '{{ $json.body.user_id }}'
  AND (free_reset_date IS NULL OR free_reset_date < CURRENT_DATE);

SELECT id,
  COALESCE(free_stylize, 0) as free_stylize,
  COALESCE(free_remove_bg, 0) as free_remove_bg,
  COALESCE(free_enhance, 0) as free_enhance,
  COALESCE(star_balance, 0) as star_balance,
  COALESCE(blocked, FALSE) as blocked
FROM users WHERE id = '{{ $json.body.user_id }}';

UPDATE users SET referred_by = '{{ $json.body.referred_by }}'
WHERE id = '{{ $json.body.user_id }}'
  AND referred_by IS NULL
  AND '{{ $json.body.referred_by }}' != ''
  AND '{{ $json.body.referred_by }}' != 'undefined';
